description:
In https://review.openstack.org/#/c/272471/ we added checks of attach interface capabilies
of drivers, but the checks of detach interfaces was forgot. We should also add it.
title: We should also add check for detach interface capabilities of drivers

comments.content:
In https://review.openstack.org/#/c/272471/ we added checks of attach interface capabilies
of drivers, but the checks of detach interfaces was forgot. We should also add it.

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Michael Still (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/308115
Reason: This patch has been sitting unchanged for more than 12 weeks. I am therefore going to abandon it to keep the nova review queue sane. Please feel free to restore the change if you're still working on it.
